Clear_Clipboard_Confirm: Are you sure you want to clear the clipboard?
Confirm_Folder_del: Are you sure to delete the folder and all the elements in it?
Confirm_del: Are you sure you want to delete?
Copy_Cut_Count_Limit: You selected too many files/folders to :msg_sub_action . Limit: :copy_cut_max_count files/operation
Copy_Cut_Size_Limit: The selected files/folders are too big to %1$s. Limit: %2$d MB/operation
Dir_No_Write: The directory you selected is not writable.
Error_Upload: The uploaded file exceeds the max size allowed.
File_Open_Edit_Not_Allowed: You are not allowed to :sub_action this file.
File_Permission_Wrong_Mode: The supplied permission mode is incorrect.
File_Save_Error: There was an error while saving the file.
Files_ON_Clipboard: There are files on the clipboard.
Function_Disabled: The :function function has been disabled by the server.
No_Extension: You have to add a file extension.
Paste_Confirm: Are you sure you want to paste to this directory? This will overwrite existing files/folders if encountered any.
Swipe_help: Swipe the name of file/folder to show options
Upload_base_help: Drag & Drop files(modern browsers) or click in upper button to Add the file(s) and click on Start upload. When the upload is complete, click the 'Return to files list' button.

Upload_error_messages.1: The uploaded file exceeds the upload_max_filesize directive in php.ini
Upload_error_messages.2: The uploaded file exceeds the MAX_FILE_SIZE directive that was specified in the HTML form
Upload_error_messages.3: The uploaded file was only partially uploaded
Upload_error_messages.7: Failed to write file to disk
Upload_error_messages.8: A PHP extension stopped the file upload
Upload_error_messages.post_max_size: The uploaded file exceeds the post_max_size directive in php.ini

Zip_Invalid: This extension is not supported. Valid: zip, gz, tar.
Zip_No_Extract: Could not extract. File might be corrupt.
ftp_cant_chmod: Can't chmod on a non Unix FTP server
ftp_failure: Something gone wrong with ftp server
max_size_reached: Your image folder has reach its maximale size of :size MB.
